alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 25 at 3:00AM PDT until March 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches possible with local amounts over two feet at higher elevations. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * Additional Details...Up to 4 inches as low as 2000 feet Monday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
